analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khyad par med do //
translated: and the thus-gone, worthy, perfect buddhas.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,” replied Mañjuśrī,🔽“if in the equality of all phenomena there is no distinction between ordinary beings,🔽stream-enterers, once-returners, non-returners, arhats, pratyekabuddhas,

original: de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir @472b 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
analyzed: de ste chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la so so'i skye bo rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir @472b 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
translated: and bodhisattvas,

original: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la khyad par ma mchis na /
translated: and the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas are not distinct,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ci'i slad du sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog dang / dkon mchog gsum po de dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: why do the jewel of the Buddha, the jewel of the Dharma, and the jewel of the Saṅgha come to appear in the world?”

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: The Blessed One replied, “Subhūti, what do you think?

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la /
translated: Is the jewel of the Buddha one thing,

original: chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te /
analyzed: chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te /
translated: the jewel of the Dharma another,

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la /
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la /
translated: the jewel of the Saṅgha another,

original: chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam /
translated: and the sameness of dharmas another?”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal pa ltar na /🔽sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la /
analyzed: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal pa ltar na / sangs rgyas dkon mchog kyang gzhan la /
translated: according to the meaning of what I have understood from the Blessed One’s teaching,🔽the jewel of the Buddha is one thing,

original: chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te /
analyzed: chos dkon mchog kyang gzhan te /
translated: the jewel of the Dharma another,🔽and the jewel of the Saṅgha another,

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la /
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog kyang gzhan zhig la /
translated: The jewel of the Saṅgha is also not something else.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags kyi /
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags kyi /
translated: The equality of phenomena is also not something else.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de /🔽chos de dag thams cad ni ldan @473a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / chos dkon mchog gang lags pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gang lags pa de nyid chos mnyam pa nyid de / chos de dag thams cad ni ldan @473a *//
translated: the jewel of the Buddha, the jewel of the Dharma, and the jewel of the Saṅgha are the equality of phenomena.

original: pa'ang ma lags /🔽mi ldan pa'ang ma lags /
analyzed: pa'ang ma lags / mi ldan pa'ang ma lags /
translated: All these phenomena are neither conjoined nor disjoined.

original: gzugs ma mchis pa /🔽bstan du ma mchis pa /🔽thogs pa ma mchis pa /
analyzed: gzugs ma mchis pa / bstan du ma mchis pa / thogs pa ma mchis pa /
translated: They are immaterial,

original: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste; 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid gcig pa ste; 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'o //
translated: unobstructed, and have a single defining characteristic: they are without defining characteristics.

original: de ltar na chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o //
analyzed: de ltar na chos rnams mtshan nyid ma mchis pa la 'di ni so so'i skye bo'o //
translated: In this way, in phenomena that are without defining characteristics, one cannot say, ‘This is an ordinary person,

original: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o //
translated: this is a stream enterer,

original: 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'o //
translated: this is a once returner, this is a non-returner, this is a worthy one, this is a pratyekabuddha, this is a bodhisattva,

original: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo //
analyzed: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes rnam par dgod par bgyi ba de ni bcom ldan 'das kyi yul lo //
translated: “The Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One” is the domain of the Lord.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is so!

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams rnam par dgod pa de ni /
translated: The arrangement of dharmas without marks

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul lo //
translated: is the domain of the Tathāgata.

original: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o //
analyzed: de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o //
translated: That is the power of the Tathāgata.

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ste de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas la mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i phyir /
translated: If the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One, having fully awakened to awakening,

original: chos rnams rnam par bkod par ma mdzad na sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: chos rnams rnam par bkod par ma mdzad na sems can dmyal ba yod par mngon nam /
translated: had not arranged the dharmas because of having fully awakened, would the hells exist?

original: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the animal realm, the world of Yama, and the human realm evident?

original: rgyal @473b chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam /🔽sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang /🔽tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang /
analyzed: rgyal @473b chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha yod par mngon nam / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang /
translated: Are the gods of the Catur­mahā­rāja­kāyika realm evident?🔽Are the gods of the Trayas­triṃśa, Yāmā, Tuṣita, Nirmāṇa­rata, Para­nirmita­vaśa­vartin, Brahmakāyika, Brahmapurohita, Brahmapārṣadya, Mahābrahma, Parīttābha, Apramāṇābha, Ābhāsvara, Parīttaśubha, Apramāṇaśubha, Śubhakṛtsna, Bṛhatphala, Avṛha, Atapa, Sudarśana, and Akaniṣṭha realms evident?🔽Are the gods of the Suddhāvāsa realms of the Sudṛśa, Sudarśana, Sudṛśa, Sudarśana, Atapa, and Akaniṣṭha realms evident?

original: mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the gods of the Suddhāvāsa realms of the Sudṛśa, Sudarśana, Sudarśana, Sudarśana, Atapa, and Akaniṣṭha realms evident?

original: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha yod par mngon nam /
translated: the gods of the sphere of infinite space, the gods of the sphere of infinite consciousness, the gods of the sphere of nothingness, and the gods of the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the perfection of giving?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom?

original: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see the ten grounds of a bodhisattva?

original: nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see inner emptiness?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod par mngon nam /
translated: Do you see up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature?

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par @474a *//
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang / yang dag par @474a *//
translated: Do you see the applications of mindfulness, the right efforts,

original: spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: the bases of supernatural powers, the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, and the noble eightfold path?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: “Do you think that the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the serial absorptions, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: and wishlessness, the clairvoyances, the meditative stabilizations, and the dhāraṇī gateways exist?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod par mngon nam /
translated: “Do you think that the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four kinds of fearlessness, the four kinds of detailed and thorough knowledge, great love, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas exist?

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the thirty-two marks of a great being and the eighty minor marks evident?

original: sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang; chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang; chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the Jewel of the Buddha, the Jewel of the Dharma, and the Jewel of the Saṅgha evident?

original: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the Hearers’ Vehicle, the Solitary Buddhas’ Vehicle, and the Great Vehicle evident?

original: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad pa yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are those who follow by faith, those who follow by the Dharma, and the eighth-stage [practitioners] evident?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom @474b pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom @474b pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod par mngon nam /
translated: Are the stream enterers, the once-returners, the nonreturners, the arhats, the pratyekabuddhas, the bodhisattvas, and the tathāgatas, arhats, perfectly awakened buddhas evident?

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He replied, “Blessed One,

original: chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos de dag thams cad ni mchis par mngon par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: all those phenomena are not evident.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One replied:

original: rab 'byor / de lta bas na de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g-yo la /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de lta bas na de ltar chos mnyam pa nyid las kyang mi g-yo la /
translated: Subhūti, it is because of this that the Tathāgata, without wavering from the sameness of all phenomena,

original: chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o //
analyzed: chos rnams rnam par dgod par mdzad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o //
translated: sets forth the Dharma in various ways. This is the power of the Tathāgata.🔽Subhūti said:

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba de bzhin du so so'i skye bo rnams kyang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: just as the Tathāgata does not waver from the sameness of all phenomena, do ordinary beings also not waver from the sameness of all phenomena?

original: de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
translated: In the same way, do those who follow by faith, those who follow by the teachings, those of the eighth stage, the stream-enterers, the once-returners, the non-returners, the arhats,

original: rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo ba lags sam /
translated: the pratyekabuddhas, and the bodhisattvas also not waver from the sameness of all phenomena?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor / de de bzhin no //
translated: “Subhūti, it is so!

original: de de bzhin te /
analyzed: de de bzhin te /
translated: It is just as you have said!

original: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor / chos thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo'o //
translated: Subhūti, all phenomena do not move from the sameness of phenomena.

original: chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o //
analyzed: chos mnyam pa nyid las mi 'da'o //
translated: They do not go beyond the sameness of phenomena.

original: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @475a *//
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ci'i phyir zhe na / de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas @475a *//
translated: Subhūti, why is that?🔽It is because the suchness, unmistaken suchness, unaltered suchness, nature of phenomena, dharma-constituent, establishment of phenomena, certification of phenomena, and limit of reality of the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas

original: rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
analyzed: rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa de nyid ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
translated: is precisely the suchness,

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: It is the true nature of phenomena, the expanse of reality, the seat of reality, the absence of error in phenomena, and the limit of reality.

original: de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
analyzed: de nyid ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang /
translated: It is the suchness, the unmistaken suchness, the unaltered suchness, the true nature of phenomena, the expanse of reality, the seat of reality, the absence of error in phenomena, and the limit of reality of those who follow by means of faith, those who follow by means of the teachings, those who are on the eighth [bodhisattva] level, those who are stream enterers, those who are once-returners, those who are nonreturners, those who are arhats,🔽those who are pratyekabuddhas, and those who are bodhisattva great beings.

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /🔽chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang /🔽chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste /
translated: It is the suchness, the unmistaken suchness, the unaltered suchness, the true nature of phenomena, the expanse of reality, the seat of reality, the absence of error in phenomena, and the limit of reality of the buddhas, the bhagavans.

original: de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ni chos mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: All of them are the sameness of dharmas.

original: de de las rnam par mi 'da'o //
analyzed: de de las rnam par mi 'da'o //
translated: They do not go beyond that.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de dag gi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid @475b nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /🔽yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te /
analyzed: de dag gi chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid @475b nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni de nyid yin te /
translated: The dharmatā of those, the dharma-element, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, suchness, non-otherness suchness, and the very limit of reality are just that.

original: de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med do //
analyzed: de dag las chos mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gzhan gang yang med do //
translated: There is no other sameness of dharmas than those.🔽Subhūti said,

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /🔽bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Lord,

original: gal te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
analyzed: gal te de ltar so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang lags pa nyid dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang /
translated: if the sameness of dharmas that is of ordinary people is just that of the followers of faith, the followers of reality, the eighth, the stream enterer, the once-returner, the non-returner, the one freed by wisdom, the one going upstream, the pratyekabuddha, and the bodhisattva, and if the sameness of dharmas that is of the bodhisattva is just that of the tathāgatas,

original: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: the dharmas of the stream enterers, the once-returners, the non-returners, the arhats, the pratyekabuddhas, and the bodhisattva great beings,🔽and the dharmas of the tathāgatas, the arhats, the perfectly enlightened buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid lags na /
translated: are the same, Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos 'di lta ste /
translated: these dharmas with different characteristics, namely,

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang /
translated: form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness; the sense spheres; the elements; dependent origination; desire, anger, and ignorance; and all the views,

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin @476a *//🔽pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin @476a *// pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the meditative stabilities, the immeasurable aspirations, the formless meditative stabilizations, the transcendent perfection of generosity, the transcendent perfection of ethical discipline, the transcendent perfection of tolerance,🔽the transcendent perfection of perseverance, the transcendent perfection of meditative concentration, the transcendent perfection of wisdom, the transcendent perfection of skillful means, the transcendent perfection of aspiration,

original: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
analyzed: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /
translated: the transcendent perfection of power, the transcendent perfection of pristine cognition, the ten bodhisattva levels, the applications of mindfulness, the correct exertions, the supports for miraculous ability,

original: dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang; 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
analyzed: dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang; 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
translated: the faculties, the powers, the branches of awakening, the noble eightfold path, the noble truths, the emptiness gate of liberation, the signlessness gate of liberation, and the wishlessness gate of liberation;

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
translated: inner emptiness, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature, the eight liberations, the nine serial steps of meditative absorption, the five kinds of supernormal knowledge, all the meditative stabilities,

original: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
translated: all the dhāraṇī gateways, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four kinds of intrepid confidence, the four kinds of exact knowledge, great loving kindness, great compassion, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas;

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang @476b po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang @476b po brgyad cu dang / 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams te /
translated: the thirty-two major marks of a great man, the eighty minor marks, the compounded element, and the uncompounded element.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: chos de dag thams cad ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba /
analyzed: chos de dag thams cad ni kun kyang gcig dang gcig tu mi 'dra ba /
translated: all these dharmas are not the same as each other,

original: gcig las gcig 'das pa'o //
analyzed: gcig las gcig 'das pa'o //
translated: one after another.

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Bhagavān,

original: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
translated: why is that?

original: de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar gzugs kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: It is because the dharmatā of form is one thing,

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the dharmatā of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is another.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: The dharmatā of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination is another.

original: 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /🔽zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan / zhe sdang gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: The dharmatā of desire is another.🔽The dharmatā of anger is another.

original: gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: gti mug gi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: The dharmatā of ignorance is another.

original: lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: lta ba'i rnam pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: The dharmatā of the views is another.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the perfection of generosity is one thing,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the perfection of conduct, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom is another,

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of inner emptiness is one thing,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: up to the dharmatā of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is another,

original: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the applications of mindfulness is one thing,

original: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos @477a *//🔽nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i chos @477a *//🔽nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and eightfold noble path is another,🔽and the dharmatā of the ten powers, four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, and eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha is another.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the forms of absorption, emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: signlessness, and aspirationlessness, the higher cognitions, the meditative stabilities, and the dhāraṇī gateways are one thing,🔽and the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, great love, great compassion, and the distinct attributes of a buddha are another,🔽and the thirty-two major marks and the eighty minor marks of a great person are another,🔽and the perfection of giving is another,🔽and the perfection of morality, patience, perseverance, concentration, and wisdom is another,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the emptiness of internal phenomena is another,🔽and the emptiness of external phenomena, the emptiness of both external and internal phenomena, the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great extent, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of conditioned phenomena, the emptiness of unconditioned phenomena, the emptiness of the unlimited, the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end, the emptiness of non-dispersal, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of non-apprehension, the emptiness of non-entities, and the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities are another,🔽and the applications of mindfulness are another,🔽and the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, and path are another,🔽and the ten powers are another,🔽and the fearlessnesses, detailed and thorough knowledges, and distinct attributes of a buddha are another,🔽and the four forms of correct understanding are another,🔽and the four forms of fearlessness are another,🔽and the four forms of individual correct understanding are another,🔽and the four forms of correct knowledge are another,🔽and the four forms of complete knowledge are another,🔽and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are another,🔽and the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment are another,🔽and the ten powers are another,🔽and the four forms of fearlessness are another,🔽and the four forms of correct understanding are another,🔽and the four forms of individual correct understanding are another,🔽and the five powers are another,🔽and the five strengths are another,🔽and the seven aspects of enlightenment are another,🔽and the noble eightfold path is another,

original: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: and the ten forms of total recall are another,

original: 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi chos nyid kyang gzhan /
translated: the dharmatā of the compounded element and the uncompounded element are different,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: Blessed One,

original: ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: ji ltar mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid mtshan nyid gcig par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: how is it that the dharmatā of phenomena with different characteristics becomes a single characteristic?

original: chos rnams par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: chos rnams par dgod par ni ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How is it that phenomena are classified?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: gang la gnas shing chos rnams tha dad du bgyid pa lags /
translated: what do they abide in to differentiate phenomena?

original: chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems @477b dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na /
analyzed: chos rnams tha dad du ma bgyis par ni byang chub sems dpa' sems @477b dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par mi nus na /
translated: If bodhisattva great beings cannot practice the perfection of wisdom without differentiating phenomena,

original: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: how do bodhisattva great beings, when practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags /
analyzed: sa nas sar 'phar zhing skyon med par 'jug pa lags /
translated: progress from ground to ground and enter into faultlessness?”

original: ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas /
analyzed: ji ltar skyon med par zhugs nas /
translated: How does one enter without fault?

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das te /
translated: How does one transcend the levels of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas?

original: mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags /
translated: How does one perfect the superknowledges?

original: ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing /
analyzed: ji ltar mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse zhing /
translated: How does one play with the superknowledges?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: How does one perfect the perfection of generosity, the perfection of discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par rtse bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang / de dag la rnam par rtse bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchi ba lags /
translated: and the perfection of wisdom? How does one, through playing with them, travel from buddha realm to buddha realm?

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa lags /
translated: How does one serve the blessed buddhas?

original: de dag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags /
analyzed: de dag tu'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags /
translated: How does one plant roots of virtue in those places?

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags /
translated: By that wholesome root, they bring sentient beings to full maturity.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa lags /
translated: They take hold of a buddhafield.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,🔽“Subhūti, it is just as you have said.

original: rab 'byor / gang 'di skad du de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gang 'di skad du de ste chos thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid so so'i skye bo rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: That which is the sameness of dharmas is the sameness of ordinary people,

original: de nyid dad pa'i rjes su @478a *//
analyzed: de nyid dad pa'i rjes su @478a *//
translated: and that is the sameness of those who follow trust,

original: 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
analyzed: 'brang ba rnams dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang / brgyad pa rnams dang / rgyun du zhugs pa rnams dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /
translated: those who follow the teachings, those who are in the eighth stage, those who are stream enterers, once-returners, non-returners, and arhats, and those who are pratyekabuddhas, and that is the sameness of bodhisattvas, and that is the sameness of tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos mnyam pa nyid yin na /
translated: the dharmas of the bodhisattva great beings, and the dharmas of the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas are the same.

original: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba'i chos rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ji ltar gcig par 'gyur zhes zer ba ni /
translated: How could the sameness of dharmas with different characteristics be the same?”

original: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
analyzed: rab 'byor / de ji snyam du sems /
translated: Subhūti, what do you think?

original: gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: gzugs kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the dharmatā of form not emptiness?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the dharmatā of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness not emptiness?

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the dharmatā of the constituents, the sense fields, and dependent origination not emptiness?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the dharmatā of the perfection of giving not emptiness?

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom itself emptiness?

original: @478b nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: @478b nang stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of inner emptiness itself emptiness?

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature itself emptiness?

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is not the reality of the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment itself emptiness?

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang /
translated: the emptiness of the meditative stabilizations, the emptiness of the immeasurables, the emptiness of the formless meditative stabilizations, the emptiness of the liberations, the emptiness of the serial absorptions, the emptiness of emptiness,

original: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: the emptiness of signlessness, the emptiness of wishlessness, the emptiness of the superknowledges, the emptiness of the meditative stabilizations, and the emptiness of the dhāraṇī gateways just emptiness?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Are not the emptiness of the powers of the tathāgatas, the emptiness of the fearlessnesses, the emptiness of the detailed and thorough knowledges, the emptiness of great compassion, and the emptiness of the distinct attributes of a buddha just emptiness?

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of the fruit of stream enterer not emptiness?

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /🔽rgyun du @479a *//
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam / rgyun du @479a *//
translated: Is the fruit of once-returner, the fruit of non-returner, arhatship, individual enlightenment, and even the knowledge of all aspects not emptiness?

original: zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhugs pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de nyid stong pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Is the intrinsic nature of stream enterer, once-returner, non-returner, arhat, pratyekabuddha, bodhisattva, and tathāgata not emptiness?🔽Subhūti replied,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: de ni stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de ni stong pa nyid do //
translated: that is emptiness.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said,

original: 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: 'o na stong pa nyid la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: “Well then, is the defining characteristic of form in emptiness?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness,

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
translated: the characteristics of the perfection of generosity, the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance,

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom,

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of inner emptiness,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: up to the characteristics of the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature,

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the characteristics of the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment,

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: the noble truths, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the liberations, the forms of absorption, emptiness, signlessness,

original: smon pa med pa dang / @479b mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: smon pa med pa dang / @479b mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: wishlessness, the higher cognitions, the meditative stabilities, and the dhāraṇī gateways;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang; snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang; snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the powers of the tathāgatas, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, great compassion, and the distinct attributes of a buddha;

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of the result of stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the result of stream enterer, the result of once-returner, the result of non-returner, the state of a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha’s awakening, up to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid dam /
translated: the defining characteristics of a stream enterer,

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam /🔽chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs sam /🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /🔽de ni ma lags so //
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid dam / chos kyi mtshan nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang dmigs sam / gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das / de ni ma lags so //
translated: the defining characteristics of a once-returner, a non-returner, a worthy one, a pratyekabuddha, a bodhisattva, or a tathāgata,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de lta bas na rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste /🔽chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo med /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /🔽rab 'byor / de lta bas na rnam grangs des 'di ltar rig par bya ste /🔽chos thams cad kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de la'ang so so'i skye bo med /
translated: or the defining characteristics of dharmas, that is, of the dharmas of ordinary people, or the dharmas of the noble ones, or the dharmas of the śrāvakas, or the dharmas of the pratyekabuddhas, or the dharmas of the buddhas, or the dharmas of the śrāvaka vehicle, or the dharmas of the pratyekabuddha vehicle, or the dharmas of the Great Vehicle, or the dharmas of the śrāvaka result, or the dharmas of the pratyekabuddha result, or the dharmas of the result of a tathāgata, or the dharmas of the result of a pratyekabuddha, or the dharmas of the result of a worthy one, or the dharmas of the result of a non-returner, or the dharmas of the result of a once-returner, or the dharmas of the result of a stream enterer, or the dharmas of the result of a tathāgata, or the dharmas of the result of a pratyekabuddha, or the dharmas of the result of a worthy one, or the dharmas of the result of a non-returner, or the dharmas of the result of a once-returner, or the dharmas of the result of a stream enterer, or the dharmas of the result of a tathāgata, or the dharmas of the result of a pratyekabuddha, or the dharmas of the result of a worthy one, or the dharmas of the result of a non-returner, or the dharmas of the result of a once-returner, or the dharmas of the result of a stream enterer, or the dharmas of the result of a t

original: so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'ang med /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'ang med /
translated: It does not exist apart from ordinary beings.🔽It does not exist apart from those who are followers through faith.

original: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med /
analyzed: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba med /
translated: It does not exist apart from those who are followers through faith.🔽It does not exist apart from those who are followers of reality.

original: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la @480a *//🔽brgyad pa'ang med /🔽brgyad pa las gud na'ang de med /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba las gud na'ang de med / de la @480a *// brgyad pa'ang med / brgyad pa las gud na'ang de med /
translated: It does not exist apart from those who are followers of reality.🔽It does not exist apart from those who are of the eighth stage.

original: de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa med /
analyzed: de la'ang rgyun du zhugs pa med /
translated: It does not exist apart from those who are of the eighth stage.

original: rgyun du zhugs pa las gud na'ang de med /🔽de la'ang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med /
analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa las gud na'ang de med / de la'ang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba med /
translated: It does not exist apart from those who are stream enterers.🔽It does not exist apart from those who are stream enterers.🔽It does not exist apart from those who are once returners.

original: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med /
analyzed: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba las gud na'ang de med /
translated: It does not exist apart from those who are once returners.
